channel.title: Access Tech Weekly
channel.description: Welcome to Access Tech Weekly, where we discuss the latest in technology from a blindness perspective.
channel.copyright: Attribution Required. Not for commercial use.
channel.itunes:author: Wesley Martin and Guests, with Music by Andre Louis

item.title: ShopGPT Updates, You're Lucky if You Don't Have the New Copilot App Yet, and WhatsApp Can Now be Your Default Messaging and Calling App on iPhone
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description:
ShopGPT Updates: Innosearch said they made ShopGPT smarter and more accurate, and expanded it to the following countries:
• UK: +44 7727 247467
• Canada: +1 782 222 7467
• Australia: +61 489 267 467
You're Lucky if You Don't Have the New Copilot App Yet: Microsoft Made a drastic overhaul of the Copilot app (again), and it's a screen reader catastrophe.
And WhatsApp can now be your default messaging and calling app on iPhone. Transcript

item.title: Everything Orbit with Venkatesh Chari
item.author: Wesley Martin with Venkatesh Chari, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: This week, we talk to Venkatesh Chari about Orbit Player, Orbit Speak, Orbit Readers, Orbit Slate, Optima, and Orbit Research in general. orbitreader.com Music by Andre Louis. AndreLouis.com

item.title: Innosearch Just Made the Worst Product I've Used in a While, Vispero Announces the Insert-J Club, and a Flashback to My (Very) Early days of Podcasting
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: The podcast I played was an overview and review of the Doqaus Life3 headphones, which I submitted to AppleVis for the AppleVis Podcast. ... And I'm surprised they actually accepted it. (I guess it probably also made a difference that I was twelve then.) :) Anyhow, thanks for listenin'.

item.title: Goodbye to Skype, Hello to Google AI Mode, more about the KapX, NLS's new audiobook player, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: Goodbye to Skype, hello to Google AI Mode, more about the KapX, NLS's new audio book player, hardcopy Braille Wikipedia articles, and more! Intro music by Andre Louis: andrelouis.com

item.title: Amazon Announces Alexa+, We Sort of Get Mentioned in the Media, Userway and Google Both Get Sued, Copilot for Mac, I Got a Piano, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: Amazon announces Alexa+, we sort of get mentioned in the media (Braille Book Review and Talking Book Topics Jan-Feb 2025), Userway and Google both get sued, Copilot for Mac, I got a piano, Microsoft is testing free versions of 365 Windows apps, OpenAI releases GPT 4.5, Look at the reviews if you're buying something, and more. Music from Andre Louis. andrelouis.com

item.title: iPhone 16E, Download Your Kindle Books While You Can, Google News, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: Next Friday, Amazon will no longer let you download your Kindle books. Google Play Books on iOS will now let you complete your purchases through the Google website. Google Tasks is now it's own website, I started using Visual Studio Code, Apple released a new iPhone, and more.

item.title: iPhone SE 4th Gen Will Launch Next Week, Running AI Locally, Capsys Has a New Mobility Aid, and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: iPhone SE 4th Generation will be released next week. Apple has launched a TV app for android. Capsys has launched a new product, the KapX Mobility Aid. Innosearch AI is now offering 1% unlimited cashback on all orders. It's Be My Eyes 10th anniversary! Plus, My Mantis is in surgery, I tried running AI locally, and so much more.

item.title: News Tidbits, Galaxy Unpacked, and A Long Tyrade about the Joys of Custom Domains
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: This time, CES, the Consumer Electronics Show, is underway, Samsung has announced the Galaxy Unpacked event, and more! Music by Andre Louis. andrelouis.com.

item.title: Meta Glasses and iOS Updates and More
item.author: Wesley Martin, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: You can now call 1-800-Chat-GPT, or message it on WhatsApp. The Meta Ray-Ban Glasses get a new update, as well as iOS. Also, Google's NotebookLM gets an interactive audio overview mode where you can talk to two AI "podcast hosts" about anything. Get in touch! Call 570-500-0665, or email AccessTechWeekly@Yahoo.com. Also visit our website.

item.title: Remote Incident Manager AI Tools, and APH Braille Displays Updates
item.author: Wesley Martin with Mike Calvo and Jennifer Wenzel, with music by Andre Louis
item.description: In this episode, I'll talk to Mike Calvo of Pneuma Solutions about Remote Incident Manager, and RIM AI Tools. Jennifer Wenzel is on the podcast with me to discuss APH Braille displays updates, and I demonstrate some of the new features on the Mantis Q40.
